headline: Is GE HealthCare Technologies (GEHC) Offering Value After Recent Share Price Weakness
summary: If you are wondering whether GE HealthCare Technologies is priced attractively right now or if the current share price already reflects its potential, this article walks you through what the numbers are saying about value. The stock last closed at US$82.58, with returns of 4.2% over the past week, a 2.9% decline over the last 30 days, a 0.3% decline year to date, and a 5.1% decline over the past year, while the 3 year return sits at 18.3%. Recent attention on GE HealthCare has been supported...
